data.meta_description: Stephen Howard Case, 69, husband of Mary Louise McConnell Case, of 6226 Riverfork Road, died Thursday, February 3, 2022 at his home.   Born in Gr...
data.text:
Born in Greenville, he was a son of the late Brown William and Betty Louise Johnson Case. He was a member of Reedy Grove Pentecostal Holiness Church, and was retired from his work as the owner of Case Roofing.

In addition to his wife of the home, Mr. Case is survived by three sons: Stephen Troy Case (Charity), Glen William Case (Heather), and General Sy Case, all of Waterloo; two daughters: Stephanie Diane Case of Travelers Rest and Kaysey Arlissa Willard (Troy) of Waterloo; three brothers: Willy Case (Lucy) of Bradley, Chester Case (Janice) of Travelers Rest and Paul Case (Debra) of Marietta; three sisters: Lois Whitfield of Travelers Rest, Suzanne Mneimneh (Mark) of Travelers Rest and Rosemary Dupre (Jack) of Fountain Inn; fourteen grandchildren and four great-grandchildren.

He was preceded in death by his son Louis Case, and three sisters: Vrynda Falin, Deborah Burdette and Betty Louise Thompson.

Funeral services will be held at 3:00 PM on Sunday, February 6, 2022 at Reedy Grove Pentecostal Holiness Church with Rev. Tommy Wooten and Rev. David Robinson officiating. Burial will follow at the church cemetery.

The family is at the home and will receive friends Sunday from 1-3 PM at the church prior to the service. Messages of condolence may be left for the family at www.ParkerWhitePruitt.com.
